package:
This is the ACDK package.
ACDK
Artefaktur Component Development Kit (ACDK)
ACDK is C++ framework with similar features of Java or C#.
For a detailed description about ACDK, please read the %ref[ACDK handbook, acdk_hb].
%ref[acdk_packages] contains detailed information about the available ACDK packages.
